name: Like It's Our Last
description:
A meteor is falling to Earth soon and you spend your last minutes on the rooftop with your closest person. 

---------------------------------------------------------------

Warning:

The story contains non-explicit suicide and death and may not be suited for some readers.

---------------------------------------------------------------

Features:

✦ Exactly 1,000 words

✦ 1 sprite, 1 bg, 1 music, 1 sound --> part of O2A2 2023

✦ The end of the world... or your world?

✦ A nonbinary pal that has always been with you

✦ 2 endings

Credits:

Character Art / Main Menu / Logo / Code: lessrattical

Story / BG Art / Code / GUI: kannorii

Music/Sound: Pixabay
